data.text: Elihu ua kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze:
“Ia nɨghnɨzir bar aghuiba itir gumaziba, ia bar deravɨra kuaribar arɨgh, nan akaba baragh.
Akatorim daghem apava a barasi, a bar isɨngiz o, a ikufi.
E uari bagh mɨgɨrɨgɨaba tuisɨgh fogham,
“Jop kamaghɨn mɨkeme, ‘An arazir kuratamɨn osɨmtɨzitam itir puvatɨ,
A bizitamɨn osɨmtɨzim itir puvatɨgha arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ,
“Gumazir manatamra Jopɨn arazim damuam?
Egha a uaghan gumazir kuraba koma arua,
A ghaze, e God ifongezir arazibar amutɨ bizir aghuir manatam e bativam?
“Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itir gumaziba ia na baragh.
A deravɨram en araziba tuisɨgha,
Bar guizbangɨra, Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim pazɨ gumazitam damighan kogham,
Ezɨ tinara faraghavɨra nguazir kam gativagha gavgavim God ganɨngi?
God uan navir averiamɨn aven uabɨ gɨnɨghnɨgh,
biziba bar zuamɨram arɨmɨghiregham,
“Jop nɨ oragh. Nɨ nɨghnɨzir aghuim ikɨ,
Nɨ manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Godɨn Gavgavim Itim,
Gumazir kɨnitam kamaghɨn atrivitam mɨkemeghan kogh suam,
God uabɨ gumazamizibar ingarizɨ, me an damazimɨn magh ghue.
A gumazamiziba bar me gamima, me zuamɨram ariaghiri,
“E managh zui, Godɨn damazim en araziba bar dar gari.
Dɨmagarir bar mɨtater pɨzi tam ikɨtɨ,
God en arazir kurabagh fogha gɨfa,
Dughiar a gumazir dapaniba gevim,
A men arazir kurabagh fogha,
A gumazir kaba amizir arazir kuraba bangɨn,
A fo, me akɨrim ragha a gasaragha, an Akar Gavgavibar gɨn mangan aghua.
Me onganarazibagh amir gumazamiziba paza me gami,
God nɨmɨra ikɨ bizitam damuan koghtɨ,
“Ian tinara orazi Jop kamaghɨn God mɨkeme,
God bizir kɨ fozir puvatɨziba, da nan akaghtɨ,
“Jop, nɨ God amir bizibagh ifongezir puvatɨ.
“Kɨ gari, gumazir fofozir aghuim ko nɨghnɨzir aghuim itiba,
‘Jop pura bizibav gei, ezɨ an mɨgɨrɨgɨaba derazir puvatɨ.
Jop gumazir arazir kurabagh amibar mɨn bizibav gei.
Jop arazir kuram gamigha,
